subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Justine Henin is retiring at 25, and what rich twentysomething wouldn’t want a little variety to spice up a life bounded by white lines from the time the racket was as long as the torso?
snippet: Justine Henin is retiring at 25, and what rich twentysomething wouldn’t want a little variety to spice up a life bounded by white lines from the time the racket was as long as the torso?
